name: Apple iPhone 15 Pro
description: Experience cutting-edge technology with the iPhone 15 Pro. Featuring a stunning display, powerful A17 chip, and advanced camera system for pro-level photography.

name: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra
description: The Galaxy S24 Ultra delivers ultimate performance with 200MP camera, 6.9-inch AMOLED display, and lightning-fast Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 processor.

name: Sony WH-1000XM5 Headphones
description: Industry-leading noise cancellation, superior sound quality, and up to 30 hours battery life. Perfect for music lovers and professionals alike.

name: Dell XPS 13 Laptop
description: A compact and powerful ultrabook with Intel Core i7, 16GB RAM, 512GB SSD, and stunning 13.4-inch display. Ideal for work and creativity on the go.

name: Nike Air Zoom Pegasus 40
description: Lightweight running shoes designed for speed and comfort. Breathable mesh upper with responsive cushioning for long-distance running.

name: Canon EOS R6 Camera
description: Full-frame mirrorless camera with 20MP sensor, 4K video, and advanced autofocus. Perfect for photographers and videographers.

name: Apple Watch Series 9
description: Stay connected and track your health with the Apple Watch Series 9. ECG, blood oxygen, and workout tracking all in a sleek design.

name: Amazon Echo Dot (5th Gen)
description: Smart speaker with Alexa, compact design, and superior sound. Control your smart home and enjoy music effortlessly.
